snippet: Joseph I. Lieberman, the retiring Connecticut senator, appearing before a small audience, noted the momentous changes in the world and at home during his four terms.
abstract: Sen Joseph I Lieberman of Conn delivers what he declares a farewell speech as he prepares to retire, speaking for some 20 minutes on the floor of the chamber; notes the momentous changes in the world and at home during his four terms and quarter-century in office.
lead_paragraph: Joseph I. Lieberman, the retiring Connecticut senator, appearing before a small audience, noted the momentous changes in the world and at home during his four terms.

headline.seo: Lieberman, in Senate Farewell Speech, Reflects on His Political Journey
headline.main: In a Farewell Speech, Lieberman Reflects on His Political Journey
headline.print_headline: Lieberman Reflects on His Political Journey and World Changes in Farewell Speech
